idea: DNROHIDA Technologies private limited is a dental software company providing complete dental simulation solutions. Presently the company offers DTS PRO, a 2D smile simulation and treatment planning software, and is about to launch DTS 3D, a CAD 3D smile designing software.
name: Dental treatment Simulation

idea: AFFORDABLE HEALTHCARE AND MEDICAL SERVICES REACHING EVERY VILLAGE AND TOWN AND CREATING DATA AND STATISTICS FOR A BETTER APPROACH AND TIMELY INTERVENTION

idea:
We are software solutions company offering development of Mobile Apps and websites with the latest and greatest in tech. We aim at developing software that is so Simple for the end user that there is no learning curve to it. We've created software for many startups already and continue to do so. In this course we are also working on developing our own product for Society management.


For Society management right now the biggest pain point is visitor management and we want to start by giving a solution that lets guards connect to residents via low cost video calls and full logging of the visitors temperature, time of visit and a central log so that even if the same person goes to different places they can be mapped.
name: SimplifyTech.in

idea: Etannor is a demanding, passionate, dynamic and responsible team. We are experts in mechanical seals and related products for industry, with the sole purpose of finding the most efficient formula to solve the sealing needs of each of our customers. Our new production plant in Mumbai(INDIA), produces custom-engineer designs and prototypes in medium and small sized production runs for serial production and standardization and efficiency.
name: ETANNOR ENGINEERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: VISHA Medical provides naturally processed herbal solutions to Pharmaceutical companies for treating Urinary Tract Infections in women. Unlike conventional, costly and time-consuming UTI solutions available in the market, we are able to provide edible anti-bacterial products for instant healing
name: VISHA MEDICAL LLP

idea: Avion Privé has been serving several high-profile clients since 2007. We are dedicated to providing our clients with the highest level of luxury, comfort, and convenience during their journeys. Our services are scalable and versatile, and our highly trained staff will comply with all your needs. Helping all of our valued guests travel the world comfortably, and speedily is one of our main objectives.
name: AVION PRIVÃ

idea: A journey of happiness deals with small little things. And Linked Cargo believe in building up and growing together considering little things. Linked Cargo Express founded by Mr Lokesh Srivastava, a dynamic young entrepreneur with multiple passionate and business ideas. An eminent and efficient individual whose dedication and sole determination and aspiration helped in managing and taking a step forward in the growth and development of the organisation. We at Linked Cargo Express reach our customers with a positive spirit in helping out them in logistics and supply chain across PAN INDIA. We believe everyday is a new day, and we are always there to satisfy our customers and help them out in solving issues faced in any way on the same every day, in order to have a hassle free communication and building the potential which will help us in growing further in meeting the demands of our customers. Choosing our service will definitely include many benefits to you in terms of service, price and peace of mind, all of which we know are vital to you while sending a parcel to anywhere in the world. We offer one window solutions for all your courier & cargo needs.
name: Linked Cargo Express

idea:
AsaVaah Nutri Foods products work on the total nourishment of body, mind & soul.

Unlike the conventional healthy food products available in the market, our products are free of additives, preservatives and they are a perfect blend of nutritionally balanced edible plants, fruits, flowers, herbs, spices, nuts, seeds millets and various other super foods which helps in overall nourishment. The beautiful blend of all these ingredients gives an amazing taste texture to our products.
name: Asavaah Nutri Foods
